contentfulProduct.seoDescription: The Boyfriend Sweater features a lovely drape with an oversized cropped silhouette. Made from 100% organic cotton for a softer than life experience. Versatile and elegant, ready to be worn under your favorite coats or chill patios.
contentfulProduct.title: 100% Organic Cotton Boyfriend Crew

content.value: The Boyfriend Sweater features a lovely drape with an oversized cropped silhouette. Made from 100% organic cotton for a softer than life experience. Versatile and elegant, ready to be worn under your favorite coats or chill patios.
Oversized fit with ribbed detail on cuffs and hem
This material is certified by OEKO-TEX® Standard 100 which ensures that no hazardous substances are present
Spinning, dyeing, knitting, manufacturing, and washing process are all inspected and certified under OCS (Organic Contents Standard)
Material: 100% Organic Cotton
Origin: Zhangjiagang, China
Model is 5'8" and wearing a size Small
Machine wash cool using mild laundry detergent. Do not bleach. Tumble dry low or hang dry. Remove promptly.

productDetails.productDetails:
• Oversized fit with ribbed detail on cuffs and hem
  • This material is certified by OEKO-TEX® Standard 100 which ensures that no hazardous substances are present
  • Spinning, dyeing, knitting, manufacturing, and washing process are all inspected and certified under OCS (Organic Contents Standard)
  • Material: 100% Organic Cotton
  • Origin: Zhangjiagang, China
  • Model is 5'8" and wearing a size Small

productDescription.productDescription: The Boyfriend Sweater features a lovely drape with an oversized cropped silhouette. Made from 100% organic cotton for a softer than life experience. Versatile and elegant, ready to be worn under your favorite coats or chill patios.

content.value: "Quince’s new rug collection is hand knotted and tufted by artisans in India. Best of all, the prices are fairly reasonable for the top-notch quality you’re getting."
Five-star reviews
Five-star reviews
What our customers are saying
What our customers are saying
"We've got you covered with this very affordable cashmere sweater that somehow clocks in at a miraculous 50 buckeroos."
"New Online Fashion Brand Aims To Get Eco-Friendly Clothes From Factory-To-Closet At Affordable Prices."
Quince Cashmere Robe
- The best robes of 2021."
"While D2C brands have changed the way we shop,
Quince
is looking to change retail even more dramatically."
"A cashmere crewneck for $50?! It’s now a reality — in 10 colors — thanks to Quince."
"The brand connects with factories to sell direct to the customer, promising consumers better prices and factories with better margins."
"The Quince Organic Percale Luxe Sheet Set collection is an excellent choice for anyone who sleeps hot at night."
"You can get a cashmere sweater for only $50 from this radically transparent basics company."
"My next plane outfit when I can travel again."
"These Luxurious Linen Sheets Make Me Feel Like I’m Sleeping in a Fancy Hotel"
